AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Erection of single storey rear extension. Erection of hip to gable and side dormer roof extensions and installation of 2 front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion.
decision_conditions: The erection of a single storey rear extension, erection of hip to gable and side dormer roof extensions and installation of 2 front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A, B and C  of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The fee required for your planning application is Â£116.  Payment can be made via either our Contact Centre on 0208 547 5002, by cheque made payable to Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames or online via the Kingston council website.
